name: 余盛延
objective: 本課程精選有關教育與文化之文章，引導學生從閱讀中印證，比較各種文化和教育現象，並鼓勵學生從各種不同角度蒐集資料，俾使課堂討論呈現時代性與多元化的觀點。
schedule:
02/18	Introduction
02/25	Burger's Daughter (pp. 83-101)
03/04	Burger's Daughter (pp. 102-122)
03/11	Burger's Daughter (pp. 123-143)
03/18	Burger's Daughter (pp. 144-162)
03/25	Burger's Daughter (pp. 163-177)
04/01	Burger's Daughter (pp. 178-195)
04/08	Burger's Daughter (pp. 196-210)
04/15	Burger's Daughter (pp. 211-230)
04/22	Burger's Daughter (pp. 231-249)
04/29	Burger's Daughter (pp. 250-268)
05/06	Burger's Daughter (pp. 269-290)
05/13	Burger's Daughter (pp. 291-309)
05/20	Burger's Daughter (pp. 310-327)
05/27	Burger's Daughter (pp. 328-345)
06/03	Burger's Daughter (pp. 346-361)
06/10	Final Exam
06/17	Review and Discussion
scorePolicy: Grading policy: attendance: 10%; quizzes: 40%; final exam: 50%.
materials: Nadine Gordimer's Burger's Daughter. London: Penguin, 1980. [First published in 1979]
